name: The Roshni Lehenga Set
description:
Embrace vibrant elegance with this gorgeous bright orange Peplum top and lehenga set. Featuring a comfortable, flared peplum-style kurta and flared lehenga skirt, this set is crafted from a silk blend fabric that holds its shape beautifully. The look is completed with a matching organza dupatta, all subtly enhanced with delicate light golden gota work trim. It's a perfect statement piece for any festive occasion.

Ideal for Mehendi ceremonies, festivals, or celebratory dinners. Pair it with bold gold or silver jewellery.
specifications: Length of kurta - 32 inches (Approximate peplum length)
Embroidery Details - Light Golden Gota Work on Borders
Customization - Only Size and Length Of Product

name: GULABI JHALAK LEHENGA
description:
Embrace pure exuberance with this magnificent Reddish Rani Pink Lehenga Set. Featuring a vibrant choli with an elegant V-cut back and a beautifully flared lehenga skirt, this set is crafted from luxurious Crepe fabric that provides excellent structure and drape. The choli sleeves are adorned with rich multicolored thread and mirror work, while the skirt features stunning panel-style embroidery with traditional motifs. The look is completed with a matching net dupatta trimmed with delicate border work. This set is a perfect statement piece for any celebratory occasion.

Ideal for Sangeet, destination weddings, or any festive evening event. Pair it with traditional Kundan jewellery.
specifications: Color - Reddish Rani Pink / Cranberry Pink
No. of Components - Set of 3 (Lehenga, Choli, Dupatta)
Embroidery Details - Intricate Multicolor Thread and Mirror Work on Sleeves; Panel Embroidery on Skirt
Product Highlight - Luxurious Crepe Fabric and Heavily Embroidered Sleeves
Customization - Only Size and Length Of Product
